sentences.en: A soft spleen can be palpated in about three fourths of the patients.
sentences.cn: 四分之三的患者可触及脾脏,其质地柔软.

sentences.en: But , unexpectedly, he started venting his spleen on her.
sentences.cn: 哪知道, 老头子说着说着绕到她身上来.

sentences.en: He vented his spleen on her.
He vented his spleen on me.
Hematopoiesis of the other blood elements occurs in the fetal spleen.
sentences.cn: 其他血液成分的生成发生在胎儿脾脏.

sentences.en: His polite formulas often carried much spleen.
sentences.cn: 他那文雅的客套,常常带有极大的怒气.

sentences.en: I have to vent my spleen on someone.
I waited for him to get the rest of the spleen out of his system.
sentences.cn: 我等着他把心头的余努全部发泄出来.

sentences.en: I'm fagged out as it is without you venting your spleen on me!
sentences.cn: 我受了一天的累,临完拿我杀气呀,先等等!

sentences.en: Obviously you’re annoyed, but that doesn’t give you the right to vent your spleen on me (= get angry with me ) .
sentences.cn: 很显然你心里不痛快，但你也不该把怒气发泄在我身上呀。

sentences.en: Platelets are also filtered out of the circulation by the spleen.
sentences.cn: 血小板也由脾脏从循环中过滤出去.

sentences.en: The scientists removed the mouse's spleen.
sentences.cn: 科学家们切除了小鼠的脾脏.

sentences.en: The spleen - qi fails to send up nutrients.
The spleen can be avulsed from its pedicle.
There were other targets for Mr Livingston's spleen.
sentences.cn: 让利文斯顿先生大怒的还有其他一些人。

sentences.en: When I get so frustrated and angry, I have to vent my spleen on someone.
sentences.cn: 当我非常灰心丧气、憋着一肚子火时, 就得找人出气.

trans.tran_en: anger, especially unreasonable or unfair anger
